description: Contents: Judah ben David Ḥayyuj, al-Afal daṿat ḥuruf al-lin (ff. 1v-98r). Judah ben David Ḥayyuj, al-Afal Dawat al-Mitlain (ff. 98r-121v). Baḥya ben Joseph ibn Paḳuda, Kitāb al-Hidāyah ilá farāʼiḍ al-qulūb (ff. 122v-123r). Judah ben David Ḥayyuj, Kitāb al-Tankit (ff. 124v-132r).
title: Miscellany
author: Ḥayyuj, Judah ben David
